comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: There was a Blacklead Hotel in Canadian Lead, a New South Wales goldfields town of the 1870's. Canadian Lead is near Gulgong, NSW. See SLNSW photograph here: libapp.sl.nsw.gov.au/cgi-bin/spydus/FULL/PM/FULL1/1497/62... So, Blacklead could be part of or adjacent to Canadian Lead perhaps.

comment.author: 7234651@N07
comment._content: Interesting lifeasdaddy I never knew that. There is also a Canadian Lead in the well known Victorian Goldrush town of Ballarat :)
